SELECT A.BOARD_ID , A.TITLE , A.DISPLAY_REGIST_DT , A.VIEW_COUNT , A.HEADER_SE_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID , TITLE , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DISPLAY_REGIST_DT , VIEW_COUNT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE HEADER_SE_CD = CD) AS HEADER_SE_NM FROM BOARD_HD WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword})
AND (REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword}))
ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC ) A ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{firstRecordNumber} AND #{lastRecordNumber}
